revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=WL-500b |revision=(R1.00) |asin= |fcc_date=06/06/2003 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=EoL |type=wireless router |fcc_id=MSQWL500B, MSQPCCWL120, |pcb_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4702 |cpu1_cspeed=125 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=AMD |fla1_model=Am29LV320DT-90EI |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=AMIC |ram1_model=A43L2616V-6 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, USB 1.1, Parallel, |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=ASUS WL-120 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4301 |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM2051 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Altima |eth_chip2_model=AC101L |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5352A2 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Printer Port Controller;Attansic;AT7601F;;1; |flags=print server, |tp_firmware=DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:E0:18,00:0C:6E |oui_eth=00:E0:18,00:0C:6E }} {{TagLine|SpaceLink Home Gateway}} :[http://www.asus.com/Networks/Wireless_Routers/WL500b/ Product page]
*{{TechInfoDepot|Asus_WL-500b}} :Mini PCI Card: [[ASUS WL-120]] (R2.00)
The device will support DD-WRT when the Mini PCI card :is replaced with one bearing a BCM4306 + BCM2050.
A MAC label affixed to the board in the FCC photos indicates :the device used a 00:E0:18 ('''ASUStek''') OUI.
*[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/asus/wl500b ''ASUS WL-500b'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :v1 - Mini PCI [[ASUS WL-120]] 802.11b (Broadcom BCM4301) :v2 - Mini PCI [[ASUS WL-127]] 802.11b (Ralink RT2400)
===Reviews=== *[https://www.ixbt.com/comm/wrls-asus-wl-500b.shtml ''ASUS WL-500b & WL-100'' on '''iXBT'''] (RU) :[[ASUS WL-500b]] Wireless LAN Router :[[ASUS WL-100]] SpaceLink PCMCIA Card
